text:
Item NOo 1
TO: NAEB BOARD OF DIRECTORS 11-17-54
From: Frank E. Schooley
Re: Treasurers Bond.
Treasurer Coleman requests authority to purchase security
bond in the amount of $40*000 from the Herman Henkel Agency,
Lansing, Michigan, at a premium of $90 per year* The premium
is list, minus 10 percent. The discount is based on non-profit
and charitable organization designation. The bond is to be for
one year, January 1 to December 31, 1955o
The bonding company would be the Auto Owners Insurance Company.
Treasurer Coleman recommends approval. I concur
